newsitem.title: USA: J.D. Edwards Q3 July 31 revenues surge.
newsitem.headline: J.D. Edwards Q3 July 31 revenues surge.

text.p: Business software developer J.D. Edwards & Co said on Tuesday its third quarter fiscal 1996 revenues totaled $115.6 million for the three months ended July 31, 1996, compared with $90.5 million in revenues for the year ago period.
For the first nine months of fiscal 1996, J.D. Edwards posted record revenues of $323.8 million, up 38 percent from $233.8 million in 1995, the privately held firm said.
The third quarter revenue breaks down into $38.2 million for license fees, $51.1 million in services and $26.3 million in maintenance fees, the company said.
